If an automated cloud flow doesn't meet your requirements, you can create any other type of flow.

comments.content: Correct. Instant flows (flows that use a manual trigger) can't be added to a solution after the flow has been created.
To include an instant flow in a solution, it must be created from the solution.
This is right. Instant flows need to be created from within the solution. So B- No

I must clarify, existing Instant flows cannot be added to a solution.
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/power-apps/maker/data-platform/solutions-overview#known-limitations
Would change my answer back to B.

DRAG DROP -

Which four actions should you perform in sequence? To answer, move the appropriate actions from the list of actions to the answer area and arrange them in the correct order.
//IMG//

HOTSPOT -
You develop automation solutions for a company.
You need to share the solutions with other users.
Which actions should you use? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
//IMG//
